Variables.Comment: The <Value> should be adapted to the HANA log volume path
Variables.Name: LogVolume

Variables.Comment: The <Value> should be adapted to the HANA data volume path
Variables.Name: DataVolume

Variables.Comment: Hosts for scale-out measurements, keep this empty for scale-up
Variables.Name: Hosts

Variables.Comment: Hosts for scale-out measurements, keep this empty for scale-up
Variables.Name: LogVolumeHosts

Variables.Comment: Hosts for scale-out measurements, keep this empty for scale-up
Variables.Name: DataVolumeHosts

Variables.Comment: The <Value> is the general test repeat count
Variables.Name: TestRepeatCount

Variables.Comment: Remote port for scaleout triggers (this is the port hcmt is listening to)
Variables.Name: RemotePort

Variables.Comment: File system concurrent execution (->true)
Variables.Name: FSConcurrentExecution

Variables.Comment: Log Volume: Controls whether read requests are submitted asynchronously, default is 'on'
Variables.Name: LogAsyncReadSubmit

Variables.Comment: Data Volume: Controls whether read requests are submitted asynchronously, default is 'on'
Variables.Name: DataAsyncReadSubmit

Variables.Comment: Log Volume: Controls whether write requests can be submitted asynchronously
Variables.Name: LogAsyncWriteSubmitActive

Variables.Comment: Data Volume: Controls whether write requests can be submitted asynchronously
Variables.Name: DataAsyncWriteSubmitActive

Variables.Comment: Log Volume: Controls which blocks are written asynchronously. Only relevant if AsyncWriteSubmitActive is 'on' or 'auto' and file system is flagged as requiring asynchronous write submits
Variables.Name: LogAsyncWriteSubmitBlocks

Variables.Comment: Data Volume: Controls which blocks are written asynchronously. Only relevant if AsyncWriteSubmitActive is 'on' or 'auto' and file system is flagged as requiring asynchronous write submits
Variables.Name: DataAsyncWriteSubmitBlocks

Variables.Comment: Log Volume: Maximum number of parallel I/O requests per completion queue
Variables.Name: LogExtMaxParallelIoRequests

Variables.Comment: Data Volume: Maximum number of parallel I/O requests per completion queue
Variables.Name: DataExtMaxParallelIoRequests

Variables.Comment: Log Volume: Maximum batch size for asynchronous submits
Variables.Name: LogExtMaxSubmitBatchSize

Variables.Comment: Data Volume: Maximum batch size for asynchronous submits
Variables.Name: DataExtMaxSubmitBatchSize

Variables.Comment: Log Volume: Minimum batch size for asynchronous submits
Variables.Name: LogExtMinSubmitBatchSize

Variables.Comment: Data Volume: Minimum batch size for asynchronous submits
Variables.Name: DataExtMinSubmitBatchSize

Variables.Comment: Log Volume: Number of completion queues
Variables.Name: LogExtNumCompletionQueues

Variables.Comment: Data Volume: Number of completion queues
Variables.Name: DataExtNumCompletionQueues

Variables.Comment: Log Volume: Number of completion queues
Variables.Name: LogExtNumSubmitQueues

Variables.Comment: Data Volume: Number of completion queues
Variables.Name: DataExtNumSubmitQueues

Variables.Comment: Size of the kernel I/O queue per completion queue
Variables.Name: ExtSizeKernelIoQueue
